title: pOrUr muruga pirAn
sahitya:
pOrUr muruga pirAn pErAdaravaip-pera vArIr


anupallavi

  IrAru karattAlum dArALamAga aruLai sOrAdu vAri vazhangum sIrOngum pErALan


caraNam    arupaDai vIDugaLin aruLellAm oru sEradamoru koDai vaLLalai darishittu uidiDavE
tiraLAgat-tEDi vandu sharaNam aDaiyak-kUDum peruvAriyAna bhaktar pazhamuravE nADum
